## The application 

This application aims to providing to users the most accurate information about the car that will best fit their needs based on some parameters entered like 

* The distance
* The gas price
* The number of cylinders
    * Four (4)
    * SIx (6)
    * Eight (8)
* Horse Power 
* Transmission type 
    * Automatic
    * Manual



## The Dataset 

We used the mtcars Dataset that can be found in any R or Rstudio installation: 
```{r, echo=FALSE}

mtcars 
```
